data.name: Return Ace Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This soundtrack contains all 20 songs and 4 arrangements used in "Return Ace".
It is organized in a format that fades out in two loops, connecting the arrangement differences.
Since the FLAC version has a lot of capacity, it is a different version.
data.about_the_game:
This soundtrack contains all 20 songs and 4 arrangements used in "Return Ace".
It is organized in a format that fades out in two loops, connecting the arrangement differences.

data.short_description: All 20 songs used in "Return Ace". It comes free with the purchase of this game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1.72 GB available space
